channel.title: Hi recently got back into rsps how i change client to my ip
channel.description: ive recently gotten back into rsps , been out for over a yea, all this is way new especialy the way the servers are formatted now! i just need some basic help how do i change my ip adres in my client i cant find it anywhere

item.title: Hi recently got back into rsps how i change client to my ip
item.dc:creator: @Virgin Virgin
item.description:
@Virgin wrote:

zachtucker:

pi

GUI.java & Client.java.
Search for “0.0.0.0” or “127.0.0.1” those are the basic localhosts.
Just change it to your own.

Read full topic
